short_summary: Re-solicitation of RFP 5000072195 for janitorial services with three qualified suppliers
description: This is the re-solicitation of RFP 5000072195, NRCan did not receive any responsive bids in response to the RFP. \\( there was a mandatory site visit held on February 22, 2023. Only the following suppliers who attended the mandatory site visit and submitted bids in response to RFP 5000072195 are invited  to submit a bid for the re-solicitation 5000072195-B. Suppliers allowed to submit a bid: 1. Bee-Clean Building Maintenance 2. SQM Janitorial Services Inc 3. Toure Cleaning Services\ By re-solicitation of this requirement, NRCan is seeking proposals from the above named suppliers to supply the labour, material, and equipment to perform all regular cleaning services, project cleaning services, and related work in accordance with the specifications detailed herein.\ Duration of contract: (2023-06-01) to (2026-05-31)
full_summary:
================
### Janitorial Services for the Great Lakes Forestry Center

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Information**

* Reference Number: PW-23-01031241
* Solicitation Number: 5000072195-B
* Publication Date: April 4, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 18, 2023, 2:00:00 PM
* Amendment Number: 0

**Procurement Description**
Ressources naturelles Canada (Natural Resources Canada) is soliciting proposals for janitorial services at the Great Lakes Forestry Center in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. The contract duration is from June 1, 2023, to May 31, 2026.

**Prequalified Suppliers**
Only the following prequalified suppliers are invited to submit a bid:
* Bee-Clean Building Maintenance
* SQM Janitorial Services Inc.
* Toure Cleaning Services

**Scope of Work**
The selected supplier will provide all necessary labor, materials, and equipment to perform regular cleaning services, project cleaning services, and related work at the Great Lakes Forestry Center. The work will be performed in accordance with the specifications detailed in the solicitation documents.

**Notice and Request for Proposal**
This is a re-solicitation of the original request for proposal (RFP) 5000072195, which did not receive any responsive bids. The re-solicitation is being issued to ensure that the necessary janitorial services are procured for the Great Lakes Forestry Center.

**Trade Agreements**
The purchase of janitorial services is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Contact Information**

* Mathew Star, Contact Person
* Email: [mathew.star@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:mathew.star@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
